comment._content: See this photograph www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/3195833956/in/pho... which probably shows the same group beside the same house on the same day.

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: "Depicts a view of the Shipard family at Bungowannah, 15 km east of Albury. Seated on the verandah is Joseph Shipard, and with the children, Stanley John and Bessie Maud, is their father, Ephraim (known as Teddy). A dog is licking his hand. The third man has not been identified." "Gwenda Morrison (née Shipard) has researched the family history and has copies of these photographs. Joseph Shipard was born 22/4/1859, died 17/9/1945. Never married. Ephraim Shipard (Teddy) was born 22/10/1866, died April 1938. The children Stanley John was born 17/7/1898, died 1968, and Bessie Maud, born 22/2/1904, died 28/10/1995" – History Notes
